str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To will, wish, desire, be willing, intend, design.
From para and eimi; to be near, i.e. At hand; neuter present participle time being, or property.
To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Now, just now, at this moment. Adverb from a derivative of airo through the idea of suspension; just now.
To change, alter, exchange, transform. From allos; to make different.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
Probably akin to phaino through the idea of disclosure; a tone; by implication, an address, saying or language.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle - 1st Person Singular
str2: From a compound of a and the base of poreuomai; to have no way out, i.e. Be at a loss.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
